Author: yorklab#7270
Content: I crated an order (that I know won't go through) then logged out and logged back in and the order is still there. But will the swap happen if I'm not logged in?

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: When you acting as a maker your mm2 should be up to perform the swap. On application minimaze mm2 not exiting - it should exit only when you totally kill application

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: So with just minimized app swap should be performed

Author: yorklab#7270
Content: But logout = exit or minimize?

Author: 27aume#8635

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: minimize doesnt kill mm2 @yorklab
